definitions.definition: A cocktail made with gin or vodka and vermouth .
examples: Will you join us at six o’clock for martinis ?
My boss is out on another of his three- martini lunches.

definitions.definition: Any cocktail served in a cocktail glass , often sweet or fruity and aimed at women.
examples: I love the chocolate martinis at Trendy Bar!

main_definition: A cocktail made with gin or vodka and vermouth .
secondary_definitions: ( sometimes proscribed ) Any cocktail served in a cocktail glass , often sweet or fruity and aimed at women.
